meanings: (맞물려 있던 것이) be dislocated, be out of joint, (스텝이) be out of step
(기대·원칙·계획 등이) run[go] counter to, be contrary (to), go against, (예상에) go wrong[awry], be out of line

vlive.korean: 턱이 어긋나. My jaw locked. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : Good bye 2016😁

vlive.english: Oh, the rhythm is wrong, right?

vlive.korean: 게임 룰에 어긋나지 그거는 - 내가 너 인마... That's against the rules. - You... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
'자꾸 어긋나는 것 같아, 어떡할까?' but it keeps getting messed up. What should I do?" 듣기 View video AB6IX : 다시‼️

vlive.korean: 이건 진짜 솔직히 상도덕에 어긋나는 거 아니야? Honestly, isn't this so unethical? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <쎈마이웨이> 친구의 전남친과 사랑에 빠졌어요.
